text: Haman 10.7-8 HM 2.24, 1 Ko 6.16, Ef 5.31 saja kulaŋ agɨlaŋ iamiagagalinɨlu agɨladɨ valabalaŋ iamɨgali lɨbidɨbiŋ nulɨdɨ iduhalinɨlu agɨlaŋ kulaŋ hadihɨbɨ pabiŋ me hɨnihɨdavi aba abamalɨ uamalɨ. Haman aba abamalɨ. Haman saja nɨbɨlaŋ akica me ma hɨnihɨdavi uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ hadihɨbɨ pabiŋ me hɨnihɨdavi uamalɨ.
